newsitem.title: USA: Excel Industries to expand plant.
newsitem.headline: Excel Industries to expand plant.

text.p: Excel Industries Inc said Thursday its plastic products business unit plans to expand its Mishawaka, Ind., plant by more than 25 percent to accomodate a recently awarded automotive program.

Construction has begun on a 31,000-square foot addition to the company's 120,000 square foot Nyloncraft plant that is scheduled for completion in December. The plant produces precision injection-molded plastic parts for automotive, heavy truck and marine markets.
Excel said it will invest an estimated $6.0 million in the expansion project.
